definition: This ID uniquely defined a person, and can be linked to an MRN.
Use this column to group participants into cohorts that will be cwmpared (For example, case vs healthy control).
Ideally, this ID can link to the CHOP biobank. When this is not possible, use the sample ID from your project.
When participants are related, use family_id to group related participants. With trios or duos, the proband ID is often used.
Use a term from eHB_relationship_types_as_of_10_30.json to indicate mother, father, proband, sister, etc..
